title: Config parser error on every node restart
body:
The lodestar-cli stores an invalid config YAML to disk with
```yaml
# ~/.local/share/lodestar/mainnet/config.yaml
'PHASE_1_FORK_VERSION': '0x01000000'
'PHASE_1_FORK_SLOT': 'undefined'
```
The string "undefined" is not a number so it always throws when starting the node with
```
 âœ– SyntaxError: Cannot convert undefined to a BigInt
    at BigInt (<anonymous>)
    at NumberUintType.fromJson (/root/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/types/basic/uint.ts:90:18)
    at /root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-params/lib/utils.js:11:43
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at Object.createIBeaconParams (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-params/lib/utils.js:8:56)
    at getBeaconParams (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-cli/lib/config/beaconParams.js:56:58)
    at getBeaconParamsFromArgs (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-cli/lib/config/beaconParams.js:24:12)
    at Object.getBeaconConfigFromArgs (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-cli/lib/config/beaconParams.js:16:50)
    at Object.initializeOptionsAndConfig (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-cli/lib/cmds/init/handler.js:41:29)
    at Object.beaconHandler [as handler] (/root/lodestar/packages/lodestar-cli/lib/cmds/beacon/handler.js:21:59)
```

---

Seems that it's SSZ the one doing the serialization. Any idea how to fix this?
https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/423124c3bdfbb86a852a67518d6ad60798c699c6/packages/lodestar-cli/src/config/beaconParams.ts#L85
